full_text:
Page 330
Re: Epstein, Jeffrey 76318-054
From James Petrucci
To [b(6); b(7)(C)] Charisma Edge
Date 2019/11/05 19:10
Subject: Re: Epstein, Jeffrey 76318-054
Attachments: TEXT.htm
No it is not. MCC has not prepared any reports and we will not release anything on behalf of the BOP. They can make requests to OIG, FBI and or Centr
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: Charisma Edge [b(6); b(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Date: 11/5/19 19:06 (GMT-05:00)
To: [b(6); b(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Cc: James Petrucci [b(6); b(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Subject: Fwd: Epstein, Jeffrey 76318-054
>>> "Charisma Edge" 11/05/2019 19:06 >>>
[b(6); b(7)(C) is this a request we can fulfill?
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: [b(6); b(7)(C) USMS] [b(6); b(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>
Date: 11/5/19 6:45 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: Charisma Ed [b(6); b(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Subject: Epstein, Jeffrey 76318-054
>>> "[b(6); b(7)(C) USMS" 11/05/2019 18:45 >>>
Charisma
Our Prisoner Operations Division in Headquarters is requesting any reports prepared in the investigation surrounding the death of EPSTEIN. They are re
Thank you
[b(6); b(7)(C)
Supervisory Deputy United States Marshal
Southern District of New York
646-947-[b(6); b(7)(C)
Page 841
DOJ-OGR-00024856
